scripts.x-test: tsc || echo "continue with errors" && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks tests\tests\*.js
scripts.test: (npm run prepublish || echo "continue with errors") && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks tests/tests/*.js
scripts.prepublish: (tsc -p tsconfig-client.json || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-tests.json || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-server.json  || echo "continue w/error")
